name: editorconfig
description: EditorConfig File Locator and Interpreter for Node.js

scripts.pretest: npm run lint && npm run build && npm run copy && cmake .
scripts.lint: npm run eclint && npm run tslint
scripts.copy: cpy .npmignore LICENSE README.md CHANGELOG.md dist && cpy bin/* dist/bin && cpy src/lib/fnmatch*.* dist/src/lib
scripts.prepub: npm run lint && npm run build && npm run copy
